title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Monday 10 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: a northampton ballet dancer has been killed in a motorbike crash .
seven car transporters , four of which were laden with vehicles , were damaged in a `` sus fire last night .
a petition has been started after afc rushden & diamonds were told to register the number one shirt retired in memory of dale roberts .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on tuesday .

documents.title: good evening
text: thanks for joining the team across northamptonshire today .
we 'll be back tomorrow at 08:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the county .
here 's a quick summary of our big stories today :
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: finley will be no 17 again tomorrow
text: afc rushden & diamonds goalkeeper matt finley will wear the number 17 shirt again in their away game against st ives town tomorrow night .

supporters are again set to collect money to ward off any potential fines from the southern league , who have insisted the club register the number one shirt despite it having been previously retired in honour of former goalkeeper dale roberts who died in 2010 .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afc rushden & diamonds refuse to play no 1
text: supporters at afc rushden & diamonds raised money at saturday 's match against petersfield town to pay any potential fines the club may be given for flouting a southern football league edict to register the number one shirt .
the club retired the number in honour of former keeper dale roberts who killed himself five years ago .
current stopper matt finley ( wore the number 17 jersey at the weekend .
the bbc understands the decision was backed by supporters who do not want to see the number one shirt brought back .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : becoming dry and fine
text: showers will continue through the evening , but it should turn generally dry by the start of the night .
skies will then become largely clear with light winds .
it will turn cool in more rural spots with the odd mist patch in places and a minimum temperature of 11c ( 52f ) .
tomorrow : after a fairly chilly start , it will be a fine morning with plenty of sunshine .
through the afternoon , more cloud will bubble up , but it should remain dry with the best of the sunshine across towcester and other southern areas .
maximum temperature : 22c ( 72f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: northampton town v blackpool
text: northampton have
ricky holmes , sam hoskins and dominic calvert-lewin could start after only making the bench against rovers .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: barby road development turned down again ?
text: councils have to be able to show enough houses are being built to meet the projected need over the next five years and several developments have been rejected by councillors , but then allowed on appeal because the extra homes are needed .
but now officials in daventry say they can demonstrate they 've already approved enough homes .
permission for this latest development on barby road has already been refused .

the developers reduced the number of homes and added a public open space , but officials say a big estate like this ca n't be justified in open countryside and they 've advised councillors meeting on wednesday to turn it down .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: new housing estate set to be turned down
text: plans for a new housing estate in a village , near daventry , look set to be turned down later this week .
officials say there 's `` no need '' for the 65 houses to be built in barby road , kilsby as enough homes have already been approved that meet the projected need specified by the government .
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: have your say on irresponsible dog owners
text: it 's the last chance for daventry 's dog lovers ( and loathers ) to have their say about whether owners should have to carry poo bags with them by law .
daventry district council is consulting on proposals to introduce new powers to target irresponsible dog owners .
the council also wants people 's views on whether dogs should be kept on leads in daventry country park .
the
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: corby transporter fire 'sus
text: northamptonshire police say they are treating a fire at a haulage firm last night as `` sus
the blaze in geddington road , corby , saw seven vehicle transporters at robinsons auto logistics damaged .
it was attended by eight fire engines and about 40 firefighters .
an investigation into the fire , which started at 23:30 on sunday and was brought under control by 14:00 , has been launched .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: nine-year-old attacked while waiting with dog
text: a nine-year-old boy has been assaulted in daventry while he was waiting on the pavement with his dog .
the incident happened on friday afternoon between 15:30-15:45 in kingsley avenue .
a man walked past the boy and the dog barked .
the man turned around , swore and pushed the dog at the boy , causing him to fall backwards .
the man is described as white , with tanned skin , about 6ft , and about 40-years-old .
he was balding with black , greying hair and spoke with a scottish accent .
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: if you 're just joining us
text: here are the top stories we 've been following this afternoon :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: no-one registered to replace dale
text: the southern league division one central side had retired the goalkeepers shirt in honour of former stopper

the bbc has learned the club has received some calls on social media for one of the coaching staff , or even one of dale 's relatives , to be registered to the number , but no decision to fill the number has been taken yet .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: body found in northampton park
text: police are investigating the discovery of a man 's body in a park in northampton .
it was found by a member of the public just before 14:00 today in victoria park in st james .
officers believe the body has been there for a while and they are not treating it as sus
author: BBC Radio Northampton

the force said it conducted two search warrants under the misuse of drugs act .
two people at different addresses were given cautions for possession of cannabis .

BBC News

it was very intense and i felt very emotional , '' she said .
`` it was a really big thing for me to do because having the skin condition , i had lost my confidence and you have to put yourself out there . ''
author: David Keller
BBC News Online

documents.title: arrest after northampton stabbing
text: a 25-year-old man was stabbed outside elysium nightclub in northampton in the early hours of saturday morning .
northamptonshire police arrested a 19-year-old man outside the park inn hotel in silver street .
he has been released on bail pending further enquiries .
the victim is in hospital .
anyone with information should call police on 101 .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: polly backed by the dragons
text: a northampton woman is celebrating her success on bbc two 's dragons ' den after winning over entrepreneur
polly gotschi wanted funding for her business producing a camouflage cream for people with a skin condition , which she suffers from herself .
last night she accepted the dragon 's offer of £ 40,000 in return for a 40 % share of her business .

documents.title: investigation into corby transporter fire under way
text: the company at the centre of a transporter fire in corby last night has confirmed an investigation is under way .
a spokesman for robinsons auto logistics , in geddington road , said the company did not wish to comment on the extent of the damage .
did you see the fire , which took place between 23:25 and 01:30 ?
if you have any more information or please
author: Helen Burchell
BBC News

documents.title: transporter fire raged for two hours
text: we 're hearing news that seven car transporters , four of which were laden with vehicles , were involved in a fire last night .
the blaze broke out at robinsons auto logistics depot on geddington road in corby at about 23:25 .
northamptonshire police said some roads were closed in the area , but re-opened when the fire was contained at 01:30 .
author: Helen Burchell
BBC News

documents.title: travel : queues in the county
text: there 's queuing traffic on the a4500 spencer bridge road in northampton at the a428 harleston road junction in the roadworks area .
very slow traffic is also still being reported on the a14 westbound in northamptonshire , near the catthorpe interchange due to an earlier accident .

documents.title: jonathan ollivier : memories of swan lake
text: speaking to bbc look east two years ago before his performance as the swan in swan lake , northampton ballet dancer jonathan ollivier , who was
`` i think it 's one of the iconic roles for any male dancer to do .
dance-wise it 's so rewarding because it 's masculine , '' he said .

`` it 's physically really , really demanding , and to be in the forefront as a male dancer - normally it 's always the lady that 's in front and the guys behind making them look pretty - it 's nice for us to have a little moment in the spotlight . ''
author: David Keller
BBC News Online

documents.title: jonathan ollivier an 'extraordinary performer '
text: david nixon , artistic director at the northern ballet , has published a moving tribute to
he said the 38-year-old was `` an extremely valued member of northern ballet and an extraordinary performer . ''
ollivier was due to play the role of luca in the evening performance of matthew bourne 's show the car man in london yesterday , but was
author: David Keller

text: choreographer matthew bourne ( has just put out a statement following the
he said he was
`` he was also an inspiration and role model to several generations of young dancers who strived to emulate his enviable technique and majestic stage presence , '' bourne added .
author: David Keller
BBC News Online

documents.title: jonathan ollivier : 'i just knew that 's what i wanted to do '
text: `` i 've got three sisters that used to go dancing and , one day , one of the teachers asked my mum if she wanted to leave me to do a class so that she could go off and do some shopping , '' he said .
`` i ended up staying and that was it really .
it was n't anything that i 'd seen on tv and thought , 'that 's what i want to do ' , it was actually doing a class that got me hooked .
i loved it from the first one i did .
i just knew that 's what i wanted to do . ''
author: David Keller
BBC News Online

documents.title: jonathan ollivier : bailed driver to report back in february
text: the driver bailed over the death of northampton ballet dancer jonathan ollivier ( needs to report back to police in february next year .
ollivier , 38 , was
police said ollivier was involved in a crash with a black mercedes saloon car in farringdon road , clerkenwell .
he was pronounced dead at the scene .

documents.title: travel : queues around northampton
text: one lane is closed on the a45 nene valley way westbound at northampton , near the junction for the a428 , because of barrier damage .
queues are stretching back seven miles , so best to avoid the area if possible .
there 's an accident on the a14 westbound , near to the catthorpe interchange for the m1/m6 , which is causing disruption .
roadworks are also causing very slow traffic on the a508 london road in roade .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: ballet dancer killed in crash
text: unfortunately we have some sad news to bring you first thing this morning .
northampton ballet dancer jonathan ollivier has been
the 38-year-old was riding in the capital when the incident happened on sunday , police said .
ollivier played the lead role of luca in choreographer matthew bourne 's show the car man at sadler 's wells .
his next of kin have been informed , and sunday 's performance was cancelled .
author: David Keller
BBC News Online

documents.title: weather : heavy showers by midday
text: most places will start dry this morning .
a band of heavy showers will spread across from the west by midday , clearing to some sunshine later in the afternoon .
with light winds it will feel pleasantly warm later in the day , especially around towcester .
maximum temperature : 21c ( 70f ) .
tonight will stay dry with largely clear skies for many of us .
minimum temperature : 11c ( 52f ) .
kate kinsella
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: hello again
text: good morning everyone .
it 's monday morning and we 'll be here until 18:00 with the latest news , sport , weather and travel for northamptonshire .
you can get in touch with us at any point today with your comments and stories via
